definition: the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
monocotyledon (plant family distinguished by single embryonic leaf, includes grasses, orchids and lilies)

sentences.english: Here is the form for the X-rays. See you later.
sentences.chinese: 这是拍片子的单子，一会儿见。

sentences.english: The list could go on and on.
sentences.chinese: 这个单子可以列出很长很长。

sentences.english: Please check the list so as to avoid mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 请籽细核对单子以避拟涪生错误。

sentences.english: Make a list of things you need to do -- no matter how small -- and put them in order.
sentences.chinese: 把要做的事情，不论多小，都按顺序列在单子上。

sentences.english: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.chinese: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.english: My answer to that list is yes.
The list of ingredients sounds very appetizing.
sentences.chinese: 这张单子上列的配料听起来使人馋涎欲滴。

sentences.english: Fibrous root systems are characteristic of monocotyledons .
sentences.chinese: 须根系是单子叶植物的特征。

sentences.english: To go further, introducing something like a Parser monad is a favorite example of mine.
sentences.chinese: 更进一步，将像一个解析器的单子是我最喜欢的例子。

sentences.english: We can make the price lower if you would order abit more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你单子下多一点儿，我们可以减价。

sentences.english: In general the monocotyledon is more difficult than dicotyledon in tissue culture.
sentences.chinese: 通常单子叶植物的组织培养与再生比双子叶植物困难。

sentences.english: ShenXing questioned Chen inquiry, why outside joint SiHuo, grab the companys list.
sentences.chinese: 沈星质问陈研，为什么在外面接私活，抢公司的单子。

sentences.english: He read off the names on the list in the headmaster's presence.
sentences.chinese: 他当着校长的面宣读了单子上的名字。

sentences.english: OK, please sign your name on this sheet.
sentences.chinese: 好的，请您在这张单子上签一下字。

sentences.english: We can supply you with all the required tools on the list.
sentences.chinese: 您单子上所列的机床我们都有。

sentences.english: Commit to doing one thing on your list for just 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 先做你列在单子上的事情，就先干10分钟。

definition: a tax declaration form/a tax return
variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
quilt cover/to have money stuck (in stocks, real estate etc)
